--- [ENGLISH] ---

v2.6 - Gamepad Master & Automation Update

* Auto-Read First Line: The system now automatically announces the first path of a song as soon as it starts.
* Gamepad Axis (Analog) Disabled: Analog sticks and sensitive triggers are disabled for hotkeys to prevent drift. Only digital buttons can be assigned.
* Rescue Window: Press 'F7' to instantly center the window if it goes off-screen.
* Stability: Fixed song detection and log reading delays.

--- [TURKCE] ---

v2.6 - Gamepad Master ve Otomasyon Guncellemesi

* Ilk Notayi Otomatik Oku: Sarki basladiginda ilk yolu sistem otomatik olarak seslendirir.
* Gamepad Axis (Analog) Iptali: Stick drifti engellemek icin analog cubuk ve hassas tetikler devre disi birakildi. Artik sadece net butonlar atanabilir.
* Pencereyi Kurtar: Pencere ekran disina cikarsa 'F7' ile aninda merkeze alabilirsiniz.
* Stabilite: Sarki yakalama ve log okuma gecikmeleri giderildi.
